Movie_title: Once Upon a Time in America
Stars: ['Robert De Niro, James Woods, Elizabeth McGovern, Treat Williams']
Scenario: ['A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.']

Stars: ['Anya Taylor-Joy, Johnny Flynn, Mia Goth, Angus Imrie']
Scenario: ['In 1800s England, a well meaning but selfish young woman meddles in the love lives of her friends.']

Stars: ['Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez']
Scenario: ["Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter."]

Stars: ['Mads Mikkelsen, Nikolaj Lie Kaas, Andrea Heick Gadeberg, Lars Brygmann']
Scenario: ['Markus goes home to his teenage daughter, Mathilde, when his wife dies in a tragic train accident. It seems like an accident until a mathematics geek, who was also a fellow passenger on the train, and his two colleagues show up.']

Movie_title: Star Wars - Episode IV - A New Hope
Stars: ['Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness']
Scenario: ["Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader."]

Stars: ['Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Magnus Millang, Lars Ranthe']
Scenario: ['Four high school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives.']

Stars: ['Robin Williams, Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Stellan Skarsgård']
Scenario: ['Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.']

Stars: ['Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal, Michael Shannon, Aaron Taylor-Johnson']
Scenario: ["A wealthy art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a symbolic revenge tale."]

Stars: ['Ted Levine, Kathleen Quinlan, Dan Byrd, Emilie de Ravin']
Scenario: ['A traveling family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization.']

Stars: ["Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira"]
Scenario: ["T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past."]

Stars: ['Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash, Brittany Murphy, Paul Rudd']
Scenario: ["Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other."]

Stars: ['David Harbour, Milla Jovovich, Ian McShane, Sasha Lane']
Scenario: ['Based on the graphic novels by Mike Mignola, Hellboy, caught between the worlds of the supernatural and human, battles an ancient sorceress bent on revenge.']

Stars: ['Dwayne Johnson, Lena Headey, Vince Vaughn, Florence Pugh']
Scenario: ['A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.']

Stars: ['Jackie Earle Haley, Patrick Wilson, Carla Gugino, Malin Akerman']
Scenario: ['In 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.']

Stars: ['Tom Hanks, Helena Zengel, Tom Astor, Travis Johnson']
Scenario: ['A Civil War veteran agrees to deliver a girl, taken by the Kiowa people years ago, to her aunt and uncle, against her will. They travel hundreds of miles and face grave dangers as they search for a place that either can call home.']

Movie_title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
Stars: ['Daniel Craig, Rooney Mara, Christopher Plummer, Stellan Skarsgård']
Scenario: ['Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.']

Movie_title: The Lord of the Rings - The Return of the King
Stars: ['Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom']
Scenario: ["Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring."]

Stars: ['Hugh Jackman, Kate Beckinsale, Richard Roxburgh, Shuler Hensley']
Scenario: ["The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes."]

Stars: ['Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia, Reginald VelJohnson']
Scenario: ['An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.']

Stars: ['Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce, Kim Basinger']
Scenario: ['As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.']

Stars: ['Alicia Vikander, Domhnall Gleeson, Oscar Isaac, Sonoya Mizuno']
Scenario: ['A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.']

Stars: ['Heath Ledger, Julia Stiles, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Larisa Oleynik']
Scenario: ["A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does."]

Stars: ['Bill Murray, Adam Driver, Tom Waits, Chloë Sevigny']
Scenario: ['The peaceful town of Centerville finds itself battling a zombie horde as the dead start rising from their graves.']

Stars: ['Taylor Russell, Logan Miller, Jay Ellis, Tyler Labine']
Scenario: ['Six strangers find themselves in a maze of deadly mystery rooms and must use their wits to survive.']

Stars: ['Jennifer Lawrence, Javier Bardem, Ed Harris, Michelle Pfeiffer']
Scenario: ["A couple's relationship is tested when uninvited guests arrive at their home, disrupting their tranquil existence."]

Stars: ['Christian Bale, Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling, Brad Pitt']
Scenario: ['In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the US mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.']

Stars: ['Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore, Steve Buscemi']
Scenario: ['Ultimate L.A. slacker Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for a rug ruined by debt collectors, enlisting his bowling buddies for help while trying to find the millionaire\'s missing wife.']

Stars: ['Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone, Abigail Breslin']
Scenario: ['Columbus, Tallahassee, Wichita, and Little Rock move to the American heartland as they face off against evolved zombies, fellow survivors, and the growing pains of the snarky makeshift family.']

Stars: ['Garance Marillier, Ella Rumpf, Rabah Nait Oufella, Laurent Lucas']
Scenario: ['A young woman, studying to be a vet, develops a craving for human flesh.']

Stars: ['Mia Farrow, John Cassavetes, Ruth Gordon, Sidney Blackmer']
Scenario: ['A young couple trying for a baby move into an aging, ornate apartment building on Central Park West, but find themselves surrounded by peculiar neighbors.']

Stars: ['Jared Gilman, Kara Hayward, Bruce Willis, Bill Murray']
Scenario: ['A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.']

Stars: ['Katie Featherston, Micah Sloat, Mark Fredrichs, Amber Armstrong']
Scenario: ['After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.']

Stars: ['Chris Hemsworth, Anthony Hopkins, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston']
Scenario: ['The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.']

Stars: ['Jason London, Wiley Wiggins, Matthew McConaughey, Rory Cochrane']
Scenario: ['The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.']

Movie_title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Stars: ['Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson, Gerry Robert Byrne']
Scenario: ['When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.']

Stars: ['Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer, Steven Bauer, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio']
Scenario: ['In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.']

Stars: ['Freida Pinto, Logan Marshall-Green, Robert John Burke, Megan Elisabeth Kelly']
Scenario: ['A woman moves to a small town with her husband, but is rattled when she is targeted for a home invasion.']

Stars: ['Brenton Thwaites, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Gerard Butler, Chadwick Boseman']
Scenario: ["Mortal hero Bek teams with the god Horus in an alliance against Set, the merciless god of darkness, who has usurped Egypt's throne, plunging the once peaceful and prosperous empire into chaos and conflict."]

Stars: ['Harvey Keitel, George Clooney, Juliette Lewis, Quentin Tarantino']
Scenario: ['Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.']

Stars: ['Andrew Garfield, Sam Worthington, Luke Bracey, Teresa Palmer']
Scenario: ['World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.']

Stars: ['Sigourney Weaver, William Hurt, Joaquin Phoenix, Bryce Dallas Howard']
Scenario: ['A series of events tests the beliefs of a small isolated countryside village.']

Stars: ['Adam Sandler, Salma Hayek, Kevin James, Chris Rock']
Scenario: ['After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.']

Stars: ['Robert De Niro, Al Pacino, Joe Pesci, Harvey Keitel']
Scenario: ['Hitman Frank Sheeran looks back at the secrets he kept as a loyal member of the Bufalino crime family.']

Stars: ['Colin Clive, Mae Clarke, Boris Karloff, John Boles']
Scenario: ['Dr. Frankenstein dares to tamper with life and death by creating a human monster out of lifeless body parts.']

Stars: ['Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton']
Scenario: ['The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.']

Stars: ['Carla Gugino, Bruce Greenwood, Chiara Aurelia, Carel Struycken']
Scenario: ['A couple tries to spice up their marriage in a remote lake house. After the husband dies unexpectedly, the wife is left handcuffed to their bed frame and must fight to survive and break free.']

Stars: ['Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Tyrese Gibson']
Scenario: ['An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.']

Stars: ['Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Colm Meaney']
Scenario: ['Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.']

Stars: ['Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore, Peter Coyote, Dee Wallace']
Scenario: ['A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.']

Stars: ['Adam Driver, Marion Cotillard, Simon Helberg, Devyn McDowell']
Scenario: ['A stand-up comedian and his opera singer wife have a two-year-old daughter with a surprising gift.']
